description: Acnologia appears on Tenrou Island and begins destroying everything in sight. Makarov tries to hold Acnologia off for his guild to escape, but they refuse to let their master die and help him fight the dragon. Everyone holds hands with one another to try and cast a defensive spell against Acnologia`s breath attack, which seemingly obliterates the island. Seven years pass with the Fairy Tail members on the island missing and presumed dead.
